name: 范育成
objective: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計積体電路佈局,進而能培養學生具有設計積体電路佈局的能力,課程內容包念： 1. SOC設計介紹 2. SOC設計流程與工具 3. 以平台為基礎的SOC設計 4. 軟體應體共同設計 5. SIP設計介紹 6. 嵌入式RTOS 7. 混合模式設計 8. SOC測試與驗證 9. 專題介紹
schedule:
1. Introduction to SOC Design (1)
2. Introduction to SOC Design (2)
3. Introduction to SOC Design (3)
4. SOC Design Flow & Tools (1)
5. SOC Design Flow & Tools (2)
6. Platforms Based SOC Design (1)
7. Platforms Based SOC Design (2)
8. Introduction to SIP Design (1)
9. Introduction to SIP Design (2)
10. Introduction to SIP Design (3)
11. SOC Testing & Verification (1)
12. SOC Testing & Verification (2)
13. SOC Testing & Verification (3)
14. SOPC Design (1)
15. SOPC Design (2)
16. 3D IC Design (1)
17. 3D IC Design (2)
18. Case Study
materials:
1. 教育部SOC教改計畫教材
2. Winning the SoC Revolution: Experiences in Real Design Grant Martin, Henry Chang, Kluwer Academic Publishers.
